description: Detects password policy discovery commands Author: Ömer Günal, oscd.community, Pawel Mazur. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Password Policy Discovery
query: (((type:"PATH" AND name:("\/etc\/pam.d\/common\-password" OR "\/etc\/security\/pwquality.conf" OR "\/etc\/pam.d\/system\-auth" OR "\/etc\/login.defs")) OR (type:"EXECVE" AND a0:"chage" AND a1:("\-\-list" OR "\-l"))) OR (type:"EXECVE" AND a0:"passwd" AND a1:("\-S" OR "\-\-status")))
